name: vintage_editorial
description: Centered content on cream. Abstract geometric shapes as accent.
signature_elements: Abstract geometric shapes (circle outline + line + dot)
No illustrations â€” only geometric CSS shapes
extra_css: .geo-circle { width: 120px; height: 120px; border: 2px solid var(--accent-dark); border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; } .geo-line { width: 80px; height: 2px; background: var(--accent-dark); position: absolute; } .geo-dot { width: 8px; height: 8px; background: var(--accent-dark); border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; } .cta-box { border: 2px solid var(--text-primary); padding: 0.75em 1.5em; font-weight: 700; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.1em; display: inline-block; }
